ThingDef.label: bionic arm module
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial arm module to expand your pawn prosthetic body part. It is better than a biological arm in almost every way. You can install it to arm module slot.

ThingDef.label: bionic hand module
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial hand module to expand your pawn prosthetic body part. It is better than a biological hand in almost every way. You can install it to hand module slot.

ThingDef.label: bionic finger module
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial finger module to expand your pawn prosthetic body part. It is better than a biological finger in almost every way. You can install it to finger module slot.

ThingDef.label: ranged platform module
ThingDef.description: An advanced ranged platform module. With stabilizer and targeting system can give your pawn great accuracy and turn your pawn to specialized for ranged combat. You can install it to finger module slot.

ThingDef.label: melee platform module
ThingDef.description: An advanced melee platform module. With sensory motor and targeting system can give your pawn great melee damage and turn your pawn to specialized for melee combat. You can install it to finger module slot.

ThingDef.label: adamantium bone module
ThingDef.description: A bone module that crafted with low quality adamantium alloy. Able to sustain almost all attack. Requires skilled crafter to craft it.
